message: “Never before in the history of the world have there been more people living in slavery -- whether bonded labor or those living in sexual servitude -- but through efforts like this, we can continue to make progress in our fight to stop it.”

data.description: Early Wednesday morning about 40 service technicians from EPB, Chattanooga Gas and Tennessee American Water learned how to recognize possible human trafficking during a class led by the Tennessee Bureau of Investigation and the Tennessee Highway Patrol.
data.title: Area Utilities Come Together For Human Trafficking Awareness Training
